description: Change of Use from B1 (offices) to A1 (retail), to ground floor and basement, and replacement of window with new entrance door. New front lightwell with new rear doors to basement.
decision_conditions:
To assist applicants the Local Planning Authority has produced policies and written guidance, all of which is available on the Councilâ€™s website. 

A pre-planning application advice service is also offered and encouraged.

No pre-application discussions were entered into. On receipt, the scheme did not comply with policy or guidance. Due to the nature of the proposal there is an in principle objection to the application and it was considered that minor amendments to the scheme would not make the application acceptable. For that reason it was considered that a refusal was the most appropriate course of action. 

The LPA delivered the decision in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the NPPF.
